parameter.value: Good bye. Recommend us if you were satisfied with our service.
Good bye. Recommend us if you were satisfied with our service.
My name is Captain Bluebear from the Royal Tibia Line.
This is Thais. Where do you want to go?
I'm not sailing there. This route is afflicted by a ghost ship! However, I heard that Captain Fearless sails there from Venore.
Welcome on board, |PLAYERNAME|. Where may I {sail} you today?
